mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.account, u.name, u.type, u.phone, TRIM(u.password) as password, u.create_user, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.is_stop, COALESCE(ul.locked, 0) as locked FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_login ul ON u.id = ul.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
SELECT id, account, name, type, phone, TRIM(password) as password, create_user, create_time, update_time, is_stop FROM sys_user WHERE account = #{account} AND is_stop = 0

SELECT u.id, u.account, u.name, u.type, u.phone, TRIM(u.password) as password, u.create_user, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.is_stop, COALESCE(ul.locked, 0) as locked FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_login ul ON u.id = ul.user_id ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (id, account, name, type, phone, password, create_user, is_stop) VALUES (#{id}, #{account}, #{name}, #{type}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{createUser}, #{isStop})
